title: Harry Potter Sorting Hat Quiz: Which Hogwarts House Are You?

questions.questionText: Which house in Hogwarts do you identify with?

answers: Stereotypical courage that tells the reader that they should like you
Irevelence to the plot and sound like Jigglypuff
The milk of human kindness so much that it makes anyone who isn't a goody-two-shoes sick
The souls of children with lightning scars

questions.questionText: What shapes do you see when you look in the clouds?
What do you like to do in your free time?
answers: Wear glasses and act smarter than everyone else like a true Ravenclaw

questions.questionText: Who would play you in a movie?
answers: I can't remember a single person who actually plays a Ravenclaw

questions.questionText: What is the saddest thing you can think of?
answers: Voldemort not being reincarnated as a creepy snake-man fast enough
People ignoring your house because the author made it irrelevant to anything in the books

questions.questionText: What is the happiest thing you can think of?
answers: Harry Potter getting placed in Gryiffindor by the sorting hat ;)
Someone saying they think Ravenclaw is the best

results.resultText: You are a MUGGLE because Hogwarts isn't real and the books are a frankly little overrated.
